input: Consider the following statements regarding ‘No confidence motion’ P. Only a motion expressing want of confidence in the council of ministers as a whole is admitted and one expressing lack of confidence in an individual minister is out of order Q. A no confidence motion needs to set out grounds on which it is based. R. Any no confidence motion once moved can’t be withdrawn S. Rajya Sabha is not empowered to entertain a motion of no confidence Which of the following given above are not correct?
explanation: A no-confidence motion does not need to set out grounds on which it is based. The withdrawal of the notice by a member may be made when he is called upon by the speaker to ask for leave of the House.
